content.question: In its original placement at the Templo Mayor, the Coyolxauhqui Stone was

choices.label: mounted at the apex of the main temple pyramid at Tenochtitlan
erected on a pedestal next to the tzompantli, or skull rack
placed at the foot of the staircase of Huitzilopochtli’s temple
buried within a royal tomb chamber

content.answer: placed at the foot of the staircase of Huitzilopochtli’s temple
